name: Arbela Technologies
overview: Arbela Technologies provides industry specific financial, supply chain and customer relationship management expertise for Microsoft Dynamics AX and Dynamics CRM. Their vertical focus includes building material manufacturing and distribution, specialty retail grocery, life science, and industrial and high tech manufacturing and distribution. Arbela has been architecting Dynamics AX implementations and supporting them for midsize to large enterprises in North America and Europe. Microsoft Dynamics AX is one of the fastest growing ERP solutions for mid-size and larger companies. Gartner has named Microsoft Dynamics AX an ERP leader in this market for its robust architecture and low total cost of ownership through integration with other Microsoft products. In addition, Arbela develops markets and supports critical add-ons to Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 and 2012 such as Master Data Centralization for multi-company implementations, Security Management and Auditing solutions for mid-size to large private and public companies, and Advanced Purchasing solution for high velocity distribution enterprises.
